name: Simply Get Results
description: We sell a combination of cloud-hosted software and supporting service to our clients, enabling them to deliver better business outcomes. Our software combines our robust data model and algorithms (all the juicy intellectual property) with our leading edge forecasting and visualisation tools courtesy of our technology partners SAP. Our expert business and people analytics experts use the tool to help prioritise the insights which matter most for our clients, and in aggregate, draw out regional, global and market-wide trends.

team.name: John Guy
team.bioHtml: Founder/ COO @Simply Get Results - people analytics expert

jobs.title: Insight Associate
jobs.description:
Are you a motivated, driven undergraduate searching for an Industrial Placement year at Simply Get Results?

We are a fast and dynamic growing business. We’ve created a powerful analytics platform that uses our client’s data on their people to improve their business performance. Our unique algorithms combine people and business data to discover financial opportunities for FTSE-100 and Global-500 clients. Simply helps clients by hitting their strategic goals, improving their financial performance and helping them out-perform their peers.

Our people join us to make a difference. 

Everyone at Simply has a relentless drive to make life easier for our customers. Our vision is to . We’re a blend of thinkers and makers, empowered by the freedom to get things done. We provide the rare opportunity for you to have a real impact on a business during your industrial placement year, you will get to take ownership and see the outcomes of your work: Insight Associates work globally with some of the world's leading companies and are regularly involved in face-to-face meetings with senior stakeholders. You will work alongside professionals with years of experience. There are many opportunities for coaching and learning as well as shadowing and on the job training to help you develop the skills you need. It's a learning experience like no other.

We are looking for people who are: 
-	Out to make a real impact
-	Ready to take personal accountability and responsibility 
-	Interested in people, data analytics and big organisations
-	Determined to help people make better decisions
-	Problem solvers
-	Flexible and adaptable

The role covers a broad range of activities such as:
-	Supporting great customer service
-	Helping design insight, data analysis and visualisations
-	Leading account management, helping grow our customers and win              new business
-	Getting hands on with growing a business: Finance, People, Sales and        Marketing
-	Running projects
-	Engaging customers for their feedback and ideas
-	Supporting on proposals for new potential customers

To help you decide whether we are the right company for you, we’ve listed some handy questions below. If your answer to them all is ‘yes’, soon you may find yourself working alongside people who thrive on, and are excited by the very same things you are…
-	Do you have an entrepreneurial attitude?
-	Do you want to make a real difference?
-	Do you want to be challenged?
-	Do you love digging into detail to find the best solution?
-  Do you want to experience scale-up life, and gain an insight into FTSE         100 companies? 

Whatever the future holds for you personally, you’ll love the ride; enjoy the work, recognition and accelerated career progression. If this appeals to you, then apply below.

**How to make a great application:**
Consider how to set yourself apart from other candidates. At Simply we are looking for an attitude rather than a specific background. We think differently and challenge conventions, so please do the same with your application.

- Location and flexible working: Role based in our office in London Bridge,     but we operate a highly flexible working policy including work from home       and customer as required
- Competitive salary and benefits
- 35 hours a week (flexible working hours)

**Application Process: **
Deadline: 7th June 2020
We would like you to answer 3 questions:
1.	How do you think data on the people that work in a company can be            used to drive improved business performance? 
2.	What is your ideal role if you join us? 
3.	What can you apply from your current experience that is going to make        you a next level member of the team? 

Please send a short email application answering these questions and a copy of your CV to info@simplygetresults.com. 
Successful applicants will then be invited for a meeting with a couple of members of the team.

Are you a motivated, driven undergraduate searching for an Industrial Placement year at Simply Get Results?

We are a fast and dynamic growing business. We’ve created a powerful analytics platform that uses our client’s data on their people to improve their business performance. Our unique algorithms combine people and business data to discover financial opportunities for FTSE-100 and Global-500 clients. Simply helps clients by hitting their strategic goals, improving their financial performance and helping them out-perform their peers.

Our people join us to make a difference.

Everyone at Simply has a relentless drive to make life easier for our customers. Our vision is to . We’re a blend of thinkers and makers, empowered by the freedom to get things done. We provide the rare opportunity for you to have a real impact on a business during your industrial placement year, you will get to take ownership and see the outcomes of your work: Insight Associates work globally with some of the world's leading companies and are regularly involved in face-to-face meetings with senior stakeholders. You will work alongside professionals with years of experience. There are many opportunities for coaching and learning as well as shadowing and on the job training to help you develop the skills you need. It's a learning experience like no other.

- Problem solvers
- Flexible and adaptable

The role covers a broad range of activities such as:
- Supporting great customer service
- Helping design insight, data analysis and visualisations
- Leading account management, helping grow our customers and win new business
- Getting hands on with growing a business: Finance, People, Sales and Marketing
- Running projects
- Engaging customers for their feedback and ideas
- Supporting on proposals for new potential customers

To help you decide whether we are the right company for you, we’ve listed some handy questions below. If your answer to them all is ‘yes’, soon you may find yourself working alongside people who thrive on, and are excited by the very same things you are…
- Do you have an entrepreneurial attitude?
- Do you want to make a real difference?
- Do you want to be challenged?
- Do you love digging into detail to find the best solution?
- Do you want to experience scale-up life, and gain an insight into FTSE 100 companies?

Whatever the future holds for you personally, you’ll love the ride; enjoy the work, recognition and accelerated career progression. If this appeals to you, then apply below.

How to make a great application:
Consider how to set yourself apart from other candidates. At Simply we are looking for an attitude rather than a specific background. We think differently and challenge conventions, so please do the same with your application.

  • Location and flexible working: Role based in our office in London Bridge, but we operate a highly flexible working policy including work from home and customer as required
  • Competitive salary and benefits
  • 35 hours a week (flexible working hours)

*Application Process: *
Deadline: 7th June 2020
We would like you to answer 3 questions:

  1. How do you think data on the people that work in a company can be used to drive improved business performance?
  2. What is your ideal role if you join us?
  3. What can you apply from your current experience that is going to make you a next level member of the team?

Please send a short email application answering these questions and a copy of your CV to info@simplygetresults.com.
Successful applicants will then be invited for a meeting with a couple of members of the team.
